name: 02 SQL Serverless data exploration from CosmosDB

content.query:
-- type your sql script here, we now have intellisense

SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
            'CosmosDB'
            ,'account=cosmosdbsynapseaccount;database=RetailSalesDemoDB;key=2cAAmr4JVyCqSzL4qnWPnGrcK8ZyrCK6TBzo3Pblx2vLHxHvaf9RjZxcZg6c9rojmcaSyOVpp3aifPLxZwim4Q==;region='
            ,[Products]
    )
    WITH (
            id varchar(max),
            productCode varchar(30),
            wholeSaleCost varchar(30),          
            basePrice varchar(30)
    ) As products
